headline.main: Anderson Injury a Blow but England Eye Glory-Cook
headline.print_headline: Anderson Injury a Blow but England Eye Glory-Cook

docs.snippet: England would love to regain the Ashes in the next test at Trent Bridge but the loss of leading bowler James Anderson to injury is a disappointment they must overcome, captain Alastair Cook said....
docs.lead_paragraph: England would love to regain the Ashes in the next test at Trent Bridge but the loss of leading bowler James Anderson to injury is a disappointment they must overcome, captain Alastair Cook said.

headline.main: Senegalese Journalist Gets 6 Months for Homosexuality
headline.print_headline: Senegalese Journalist Gets 6 Months for Homosexuality

docs.snippet: A well-known Senegalese journalist was sentenced Friday to six months in prison for acts of homosexuality, which is illegal in this West African country....
docs.lead_paragraph: A well-known Senegalese journalist was sentenced Friday to six months in prison for acts of homosexuality, which is illegal in this West African country.

headline.main: Bowyer Faces Uncertain Future at Michael Waltrip Racing
headline.print_headline: Bowyer Faces Uncertain Future at Michael Waltrip Racing

docs.snippet: Clint Bowyer is ready to press on at Pocono Raceway in the wake of an ownership shake-up that leaves the veteran driver with an uncertain future....
docs.lead_paragraph: Clint Bowyer is ready to press on at Pocono Raceway in the wake of an ownership shake-up that leaves the veteran driver with an uncertain future.

headline.main: U.S. Court Puts National Collegiate Athletic Association Injunction on Hold
headline.print_headline: U.S. Court Puts National Collegiate Athletic Association Injunction on Hold

docs.snippet: A U.S. appeals court put on hold a ruling that ordered the National Collegiate Athletic Association to allow universities to offer student athletes a limited share of revenue....
docs.lead_paragraph: A U.S. appeals court put on hold a ruling that ordered the National Collegiate Athletic Association to allow universities to offer student athletes a limited share of revenue.

headline.main: Reports of Haqqani Network Founder's Death, but Family Denies
headline.print_headline: Reports of Haqqani Network Founder's Death, but Family Denies

docs.snippet: Family members on Friday denied reports of the death of Jalaluddin Haqqani, founder of the fearsome Haqqani militant network blamed for some of Afghanistan's deadliest suicide attacks....
docs.lead_paragraph: Family members on Friday denied reports of the death of Jalaluddin Haqqani, founder of the fearsome Haqqani militant network blamed for some of Afghanistan's deadliest suicide attacks.

headline.main: Price's Toronto Arrival Delayed by Flat Tire
headline.print_headline: Price's Toronto Arrival Delayed by Flat Tire

docs.snippet: David Price's arrival in Toronto has been delayed by a flat tire, a story that played out on Twitter with Blue Jays fans offering to rescue the stranded pitcher....
docs.lead_paragraph: David Price's arrival in Toronto has been delayed by a flat tire, a story that played out on Twitter with Blue Jays fans offering to rescue the stranded pitcher.

headline.main: Germany Suspends Treason Probe Against News Website
headline.print_headline: Germany Suspends Treason Probe Against News Website

docs.snippet: Germany has suspended a treason investigation into a news website while experts decide whether its articles on plans to increase state surveillance of online communications constituted a revelation of state secrets....
docs.lead_paragraph: Germany has suspended a treason investigation into a news website while experts decide whether its articles on plans to increase state surveillance of online communications constituted a revelation of state secrets.

headline.main: Car Hacking Risk May Be Broader Than Fiat Chrysler: U.S. Regulator
headline.print_headline: Car Hacking Risk May Be Broader Than Fiat Chrysler: U.S. Regulator

docs.snippet: The cybersecurity issues that led Fiat Chrysler Automobiles NV to recall 1.4 million vehicles this month could pose a problem for cars and trucks from other automakers, the top U.S. auto safety regulator said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The cybersecurity issues that led Fiat Chrysler Automobiles NV to recall 1.4 million vehicles this month could pose a problem for cars and trucks from other automakers, the top U.S. auto safety regulator said on Friday.

headline.main: Chemical Brothers Go Straight to the Top of UK Album Chart
headline.print_headline: Chemical Brothers Go Straight to the Top of UK Album Chart

docs.snippet: The Chemical Brothers went straight in at number one on the British album chart with "Born In The Echoes," the Official Charts Company said on Friday....
